_sText: This is a basic sniper field and I stress BASIC.  It didn't take long at all to create and just had to fine tune some lighting and take away the buyzones.  Get your running shoes out unless you plan on camping and you better optimize that second zoom you have on your AWP!!  You'll need it!  I estimate it to be about a 1/2 mile shot from spawn to spawn in the game.  This is definetly a long shot sniper map.  Have fun with it!
